Qvakers principles quaking, or, Pretended light proved darkness, and perfections found to be greatest imperfections in an answer to a written paper, subscribed with the name of Thomas Holme, and scattered through the country about Liverpool and Lancashire / modestly propounded by Ralph Hall ... Hall, Ralph.
[8], 28 p.
Printed by R.I. and are to be sold by Edm. Paxton ... and Tho. Parkhurst ..., London : 1656.
Errors in paging: p. 22-23 misprinted 14-51. Reproduction of original in the British Library.
=======
